years.title: AI Days @ HES-SO
years.organizer: Swiss Artificial Intelligence Centre for SMEs (CSIA-PME)

description.par1: The 2025 edition of AI-days will take place from 27 to 29 January 2025, in Geneva (27 and 28) and Lausanne (29 January). The HES-SO AI-days are organised by the Swiss Artificial Intelligence Centre for SMEs (CSIA-PMEs). The aim of the event is to provide a forum for discussing the practical use of new AI technologies in the economic fabric.
description.par2: A three-day format is planned this year. The first day (Monday 27) will be devoted to workshops on specific topics. The other two days, organised as usual over two sites and two cantons, will be devoted to presentations on the progress of the CSIA-PE, reports on collaborations, round-table discussions and recent results obtained in the field of AI applications. An official call for papers will be launched at the beginning of September, see indicative dates below.
description.par3: The event is public and open to all. It is primarily aimed at people involved in the management and strategy of one or more SMEs, to find out how they can benefit from advances in artificial intelligence in their activities. Companies and SMEs are warmly invited to take part in this event in order to :
list: Establish links with HES-SO engineers and other companies working in the field of artificial intelligence.
Explore various AI use cases through company presentations and applied research projects.
Gain an in-depth understanding of the Swiss AI Center's activities and the benefits they can bring, in particular through the use of "AI vouchers" that make it easier to produce the first prototypes.
description.end: Participation is free, but registration is mandatory.

dates.title: Important dates
dates.description: The precise dates will be announced during September.

points: Announcement of workshops (titles, leaders and committees, times)
Announcement of the call for papers

members: SÃ©bastien Bourqui, Office de Promotion des Industries et des Technologies, GenÃ¨ve

partners.title: Partners
partners.introduction: We are pleased to invite you to become a partner of the 2025 edition of AI Days, a growing event dedicated to the application of artificial intelligence in SMEs. Organized by the Swiss AI Center of HES-SO, this free event will take place from January 27 to 29, 2025, in Geneva and Lausanne. It brings together a growing audience of professionals engaged in technological innovation and benefits from excellent media coverage.
partners.contact: We would be delighted to discuss in more detail the support options and to personalize a collaboration that meets your economic promotion goals. We are confident that your contribution will have a significant impact on the success of this event and on the development of SMEs in French-speaking Switzerland.

platine.title: Platinum Partner
platine.description: You are an exclusive partner or co-partner for the organization of a part of the conference (room rental, meals).
visibility-and-presence: Your logo can be displayed at the entrance of the room.
Your logo can be displayed at the entrance of the room.
Your logo can be displayed on the room's screens (if available).
Your logo will appear on the conference website in the Gold category.
Your logo will be included in all communication materials (brochures, programs, etc.).
marketing-and-communication: A dedicated presentation to showcase your company's activities related to the conference topic.
Special mention in communications before, during, and after the conference.
Opportunity to distribute promotional materials and goodies.

gold.title: Gold Partner
gold.description: Financing of a reception during the conference.
visibility-and-presence: Your logo can be displayed at the entrance of the room where the reception is held.
Your logo will appear on the conference website in the Silver category.
marketing-and-communication: Special mention in communications at the beginning of the reception.
Opportunity to distribute promotional materials and goodies during the reception.

silver.title: Silver Partner
visibility-and-presence: Your logo can be displayed at the entrance of the room where the coffee break takes place.
Your logo will appear on the conference website in the Bronze category.
marketing-and-communication: Opportunity to distribute promotional materials and goodies during the coffee break.
